tool_description: An api showing current prices of coins
title: Cion Prices Api

api_list.name: get currency by name
api_list.description: get several states of one currency prices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cion-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/coins-prices/{coinid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cion-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GIT ALL WORLD  CURRENCIES PRICES
api_list.description: This end point will return back prices of world currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cion-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/coins-prices"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cion-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
